mapper.sql: Id, UserCode, Year, month, ScoreStatus, AScore, BScore, CScore, DScore, EScore, FScore, TotalScore, SumZdScore, SumMbScore, SumZfScore, AvgZdScore, AvgMbScore, SumTotalScore, DfScore, dbtype,dbbk

UserCode,

Month,

EScore,
FScore,

mapper.update:
update scorehistory
UserCode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Month = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ScoreStatus = #{scorestatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AScore = #{ascore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
BScore = #{bscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CScore = #{cscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
DScore = #{dscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
EScore = #{escore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
FScore = #{fscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
TotalScore = #{totalscore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SumZdScore = #{sumZdScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SumMbScore = #{sumMbScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SumZfScore = #{sumZfScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
AvgZdScore = #{avgZdScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
AvgMbScore = #{avgMbScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SumTotalScore = #{sumTotalScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
DfScore = #{dfScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
dbtype = #{dbtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dbbk = #{dbbk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from scorehistory where UserCode=#{usercode} and Year=#{year} and Month=#{month} and dbtype=#{dbtype}
mapper.insert:
insert into scorehistory(Id, UserCode, Year, month, ScoreStatus, AScore, BScore, CScore, DScore, EScore, FScore,TotalScore,dbtype,dbbk) values
( #{sh.id}, #{sh.usercode}, #{sh.year}, #{sh.month}, #{sh.scorestatus}, #{sh.ascore}, #{sh.bscore}, #{sh.cscore}, #{sh.dscore}, #{sh.escore}, #{sh.fscore}, #{sh.totalscore}, #{sh.dbtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sh.dbbk,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select * from scorehistory where UserCode=#{usercode} and dbtype = #{dbtype} order by Year+0 desc,Month+0 desc limit 0,1
